isis.stitle: TSI 05-15-02 - New Design Crossmember for Fuel Tank and Air Tank Mounting in 9000i Models

subjectgroup.subject: New Design Crossmember for Fuel Tank and Air Tank Mounting in 9000i Models

geninfo.para: A new design crossmember between the fuel tank bracket and the air tank bracket for a single fuel tank configuration or between the brackets for dual fuel tanks (Figure 1) has been implemented and available for service. The bracket ends of the crossmember have a revised radius to increase the strength of the crossmember. When ordering a replacement crossmember, the part number will be superceded to the new design.
